questions.text: What are your main goals and aspirations?
questions.followUp: How do you plan to achieve these goals?

questions.text: What skills do you want to develop?
questions.followUp: Which of these skills would have the biggest impact?

questions.text: What's holding you back from pursuing your dreams?
questions.followUp: How can we overcome these obstacles?

questions.text: What does success look like to you?
questions.followUp: What steps can you take today towards that vision?
What qualities do they have that you'd like to develop?

questions.text: What's one thing you'd do if you knew you couldn't fail?
questions.followUp: What's stopping you from trying anyway?
